query:
SELECT t.id, t.codigo, COUNT(f.id) as total_formandos 
FROM turmas t 
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON f.turmaId = t.id 
WHERE t.codigo LIKE '%642%' 
GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo 
LIMIT 5;
